title: SLB Exceeds Profit Expectations on Strong North American Demand
summary: The world’s biggest oilfield services provider, SLB (NYSE: SLB), on Friday reported higher-than-expected earnings for the third quarter as revenue from its North American business jumped by 17% from the second quarter and by 14% from a year earlier. title: These ETF mistakes can ‘quietly erode long-term returns,’ advisor says
summary: The exchange-traded fund market has surpassed $11 trillion, but ETF mistakes can erode investors returns, financial experts say. Here's what to know.

title: CNPC Defies Niger Junta, Continues Oil Exports
summary: State-owned Chinese oil giant CNPC continues to produce and export oil from a newly expanded oilfield in Niger despite ongoing disputes with the local authorities, Reuters reported on Friday, quoting sources familiar with the situation. title: LNG Producer Faces Lawsuits Over Alleged Contract Breaches
summary: Venture Global has written to its long-term contract partners in the Plaquemines LNG plant to assure them it will not sell LNG on the spot market before honoring these contracts, the Financial Times has reported, citing fears of contract breaches.
